Notes: A Brick Block that can be destroyed through all of the player's attacks. It may drop a Coin when destroyed. However, when destroyed through SW_A, it drops one Star Bit.

Obj_arg0.Name: Number of Coins
Obj_arg0.Description: The number of Coins to be dropped. Default is 1.

Obj_arg1.Name: Shadow Type
Obj_arg1.Description: Specifies whether to use a shadow or not.

SW_AWAKE.Description: The object will become visible and resume movement when this switch is activated.

ClippingGroup.Description: Objects in this group are always clipped together.

SearchTurtle.Description: Red Koopa Shells and Gold Shells home in on this object.
